sentence.Network_en: Lessons with English-speaking instructors can be booked and paid for in the resort.
sentence.Network_cn: 想上英语外教授课班可以提前预订，当场交费。

sentence.Network_en: The argument for plain language is not limited to English speaking countries, Professor Eagleson said.
sentence.Network_cn: 伊格里森教授说,提倡使用平易语言的争论不仅局限于讲英语的国家.

sentence.Network_en: Throughout the whole Empire and the English - speaking world the name of New Zealand is saluted.
sentence.Network_cn: 在整个帝国和英语世界中,新西兰的名称令人肃然起敬.
